QuestData.Title: Fate of the Stormstouts
QuestData.Description: $p! It is so great to see you healthy, and traveling so far. It would seem that our paths are quite tightly intertwined.$b$bI'm here looking for my family. I am told that several Stormstouts came across the wall to help face the mantid threat. I mean to find them, and join them.$b$bHave you seen anyone named Stormstout come through here? Would you mind helping me ask around?
QuestData.LogDescription: Ask the inhabitants of The Sunset Brewgarden if they've seen any Stormstouts.
QuestData.CompletionText: You are brave to have come across the wall, $r.
QuestData.RewardText: <Chen listens intently.>$b$bBig Dan, Han, Evie, and Mama. I understand.$b$bIt seems like Dan will be safe here. I will go look for Evie, Han, and Mama Stormstout.$b$bTake care, $n.

Objectives.Objective: Speak with Lya of Ten Songs
